Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-36039 affecting package python-PyMySQL for versions less than 1.1.1-3
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-36039 affecting package python-PyMySQL for versions less than 1.1.1-3. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package python-PyMySQL is earlier than 1.1.1-3, affected by CVE-2024-36039
